item.title: Contact
item.description:
I am always open to new opportunities and partnerships. Please feel free to reach out through:

  • E-mail: ruifmlopes.dev@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ruifmlopes
  • GitHub: github.com/RuiFMLopes

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello! I am Rui Lopes, a Computer Science and Engineering student.

My technological journey began very early, driven by a natural passion for computers and a curiosity to understand how software shapes the world. What started as an interest in hardware and gaming evolved into a desire to build my own solutions.

What I Bring Link to heading

My core focus is software development, but my perspective is enriched by an academic background in Economics. This combination allows me to approach technical problems with an analytical perspective, focused on efficiency and system viability.
